font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 吹毛求疵的人： one who is given to petty criticism and constant complaint
【例】 No sooner had we finished decorating the church than the parish教区 faultfinder decided that she didn't like it.
【近】 carper, castigator, caviler, censurer, critic, disparager, hypercritic, nitpicker
【记】 fault 错误 + find 找 + er 人→找错误的人
